name: Cikavak
description: A tiny fey creature that embodies mischief and cleverness with a distinctive beak and a mischievous demeanor.
memorable: Its unique magical abilities to silence opponents and communicate telepathically make it a strategic ally.
goals: To manipulate the battlefield and support allies through stealth and cunning tactics.
relations: May associate with other fey creatures or animal companions for information or support.
environment: Typically found in forested areas or places of natural beauty.
strengths: Excels in stealth and perception, with resistance to acid, fire, and poison.
weaknesses: Fragile in direct combat with a very low Strength score, making it ineffective in physical confrontations.
attacks: Uses a beak attack for piercing damage and a special ability to unleash a Silencing Squawk.
most_powerful_ability: Silencing Squawk that deafens and silences creatures in a cone, providing tactical control in encounters.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 15, making it highly aware of its surroundings.
skills: Has proficiency in Perception and Stealth, making it an effective scout.
additional_information: Can communicate telepathically through Limited Telepathy.
Ability to Speak with Beasts allows interaction with animal creatures.
Very low Strength score makes it poor in physical confrontations.
Good Dexterity helps evade attacks and enhance stealth abilities.
Absorbs magical attacks from acid, fire, and poison.
test_queries: tiny fey creature with magical abilities
fey scout that talks to animals
